name: FINAL STRIKE (itch) (HendersonSoftworks)
description:
FINAL STRIKE was made for the You Only Get One game jam. It's a retro wave-survival game where you play as a near-dead samurai facing off against a horde of foes. If you are hit even once by an enemy, you're dead.

Controls

Keyboard and Mouse:

  • WASD - Move
  • Hold left-click - Charged strike
  • Right-click - Teleport

Controller:

  • Left-stick - Move
  • Hold right-trigger - Charged strike
  • Left-trigger - Telepor

Credits

Music:

  • Defrini - Biogas
  • Rolemusic - The River
  • Serge Quadrado - Shaman Stomp
  • Twilight Tipi - Away
  • U.M.M. - Comando Ninja (Corrosi-øn Remix)

Sound Effects:

  • BFXR

Programming & artwork:

  • HendersonSoftworks
